title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Dark red crocheted silk ornamented with cut steel beads in zig-zag and diamond bar pattern.  Two steel rings control side opening; small tassels of steel beads at either end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-37.
